meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7068.

td.p: John Berman, a veteran newsman from CNN's Early Start and At This Hour
Wendi McLendon-Covey, an actress from The Goldbergs and Repeat After Me
Mo Rocca, a correspondent and host from CBS Sunday Morning and My Grandmother's Ravioli

tr.td: IT'S NOT ROCKET SCIENCE
CITY NEIGHBORHOODS
THE GOLDBERGS
POLITICAL DICTIONARY
THE DAILY SHOW
THIS IS C_NN_
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "C", and somewhere in there will be a double "N".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Mo: "It\'s a quarter to [*]." It\'s a quarter to--What is "It\'s a quarter to [*]"?)
(Alex: Thank you.)
(Mo: [Chuckles] Sorry.)
(Alex: We\'re making you nervous, are we, Mo? Go again.)
(Mo: Sinatra always makes me nervous. He gets very angry if you get it wrong.)

3:00

Mo
')
